two_columns_0.description: Test CV template, only used in testing.

single_column_0.description: Basic CV template with a single column layout, educational description details included.

two_columns_abt_0.description: Basic CV template with a two column layout, educational description details excluded, an 'about me' section included.

two_columns_abt_1.description: Styled CV template (green hues) with a two column layout, educational description details excluded, an 'about me' section included.

two_columns_abt_2.description: Wacky animated CV template with a two column layout, educational description details excluded, an 'about me' section included.
